actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-988.

official_title: A resolution providing for taking the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 668) increasing the statutory limit on the public debt with the Senate amendment from the Speaker's table and disagreeing to the Senate amendment.

summary.text: Provides for taking H.J. Res. 668 (public debt limit), with the Senate amendment thereto, from the Speaker's table and disagreeing to the Senate amendment.

titles.title: A resolution providing for taking the joint resolution (H.J.Res. 668) increasing the statutory limit on the public debt with the Senate amendment from the Speaker's table and disagreeing to the Senate amendment.
